entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Fund 1997. The membership of voluntary pension funds in Hungary. Manager sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D60m: TÁRKI Fund 1997. The membership of voluntary pension funds in Hungary. Manager sample.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Gál, Róbert Iván
entry.dcterms:description: the organizational principle of pension funds, their membership, the volume of payments, possible employer membership, the composition of leadership, the structure and operation of the fund, its costs, possibilities for leaving the fund
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
political institutions, public administration
social stratification and groupings
economic organization
survey data
cross-section

Out of the funds registered by the Hungarian Financial Supervisory Authority, all of the funds with more than 50 members were selected. Out of the 186 funds, 153 chair of the board of directors completed the questionnaire.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
